column4: OK, wow, just tried Ubuntu 6.06 DVD release, sucks how to discover the new Gnome ability's
Anyone got screenshots of the new gnome in action ?
Anyone got URL'sto the new gnome "screenshots" ?
that has a lot of modifications done to it. If you want the base look of it, might want to try to find something else
yea, I know, I have OSX running on a INTEL PC, be nice to get Linux with the look, linux provides better "Support" but OSX is nice to try .
check out dreamlinux. Looks nearly identical http://www.dreamlinux.com.br/english/saiba-screen.html
sweet like to install Ubuntu with that look.
if you do like dreamlinux I would caution you in using it as a lot of the documentation is in portugeese
oh yeah, that would take quite a bit of work
that is xfce, ubuntu uses gnome, you could use gdesklets if you want for the dock but it won't look as polished as that
xgl and compiz, that is a headache
that is compiz, that is a seperate thing from gnome altogether perhaps it will be integrated into the next gnome, kind of doubt it
use that link but be really careful, you could mess a lot up
Linux Pro Magazine shows it as part of Gnome and part of the Dapper Release, Includes the Dapper Drake ubuntu on a DVD for you... So I got to disagree, they say it's in Gnome now
ok well then why aren't you doing it

perhaps because it doesn't exist by default, you need to add things but you already are certain it is integrated which since it is, all of those people who wrote that guide must be retarded, I mean you wouldn't write a guide to do something that already exists by default
